title: Proficiency
content: nger Knight Feature You have sworn to serve a crown or nation and seek to bring its foes to ruin. Gain proficiency with History and Heavy Armour. One of the five Favored Enemy features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Sanctified Stalker Feature You swore to hunt the Enemies of a holy or druidic order. Gain proficiency in Religion and the Sacred Flame cantrip. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell. One of the five Favored Enemy features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Ur
